text: Allegra Versace (born in Milan on 30 June 1986) is the daughter of designer Donatella Versace and ex-fashion model Paul Beck. Allegra, a 50% owner of the Versace fashion design business, is a sufferer from anorexia nervosa.Sky News: fashion legend's girl has anorexia. 2007 Sky News == References == == Other websites == * Official Versace website Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Italian businesspeople Category:People with anorexia
title: Allegra Versace
